LanguageData.ShardSentry.label: shard sentry
LanguageData.ShardSentry.description: Sentry gun with a shard cannon. High fire rate and low fire power, this turret explodes when destroyed. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.ShardSentry_Blueprint.label: shard sentry (blueprint)
LanguageData.ShardSentry_Blueprint_Install.label: shard sentry (blueprint)
LanguageData.ShardSentry_Frame.label: shard sentry (building)
LanguageData.ShardSentry_Frame.description: Sentry gun with a shard cannon. High fire rate and low fire power, this turret explodes when destroyed. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.WaveEmitter.label: wave emitter
LanguageData.WaveEmitter.description: Powerful fixed microwave emitter. Ultimate crowd control weapon. This turret explodes when destroyed. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.WaveEmitter_Blueprint.label: wave emitter (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaveEmitter_Blueprint_Install.label: wave emitter (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaveEmitter_Frame.label: wave emitter (building)
LanguageData.WaveEmitter_Frame.description: Powerful fixed microwave emitter. Ultimate crowd control weapon. This turret explodes when destroyed. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.NestHMG.label: HMG Nest
LanguageData.NestHMG.description: Fixed gun nest with a mounted heavy machine gun. Simple but effective defense building.
LanguageData.NestHMG_Blueprint.label: HMG Nest (blueprint)
LanguageData.NestHMG_Frame.label: HMG Nest (building)
LanguageData.NestHMG_Frame.description: Fixed gun nest with a mounted heavy machine gun. Simple but effective defense building.
LanguageData.NestAGS.label: AGS Nest
LanguageData.NestAGS.description: Fixed gun nest with a mounted automatic grenade launcher. Greatly effective against massed enemies.
LanguageData.NestAGS_Blueprint.label: AGS Nest (blueprint)
LanguageData.NestAGS_Frame.label: AGS Nest (building)
LanguageData.NestAGS_Frame.description: Fixed gun nest with a mounted automatic grenade launcher. Greatly effective against massed enemies.
LanguageData.NestMMG.label: MMG Nest
LanguageData.NestMMG.description: Fixed medium machine gun on a tripod. Simple but effective defense building. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.NestMMG_Blueprint.label: MMG Nest (blueprint)
LanguageData.NestMMG_Blueprint_Install.label: MMG Nest (blueprint)
LanguageData.NestMMG_Frame.label: MMG Nest (building)
LanguageData.NestMMG_Frame.description: Fixed medium machine gun on a tripod. Simple but effective defense building. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.PortableReactor.label: portable reactor
LanguageData.PortableReactor.description: Small, portable field reactor that produce power by consuming uranium. It is useful when you need a power source that can be deployed quickly. Explodes when destroyed.
LanguageData.PortableReactor_Blueprint.label: portable reactor (blueprint)
LanguageData.PortableReactor_Blueprint_Install.label: portable reactor (blueprint)
LanguageData.PortableReactor_Frame.label: portable reactor (building)
LanguageData.PortableReactor_Frame.description: Small, portable field reactor that produce power by consuming uranium. It is useful when you need a power source that can be deployed quickly. Explodes when destroyed.
LanguageData.SuvTurret.label: surveillance turret
LanguageData.SuvTurret.description: Long range sniper turret. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.SuvTurret_Blueprint.label: surveillance turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.SuvTurret_Blueprint_Install.label: surveillance turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.SuvTurret_Frame.label: surveillance turret (building)
LanguageData.SuvTurret_Frame.description: Long range sniper turret. Can be redeployed.
LanguageData.ImpactMine.label: impact mine
LanguageData.ImpactMine.description: Advanced mine with motion tracker. This mine explodes immediately when an enemy is detected.
LanguageData.ImpactMine_Blueprint.label: impact mine (blueprint)
LanguageData.ImpactMine_Blueprint_Install.label: impact mine (blueprint)
LanguageData.ImpactMine_Frame.label: impact mine (building)
LanguageData.ImpactMine_Frame.description: Advanced mine with motion tracker. This mine explodes immediately when an enemy is detected.
LanguageData.FuelBarrel.label: fuel barrel
LanguageData.FuelBarrel.description: The big red barrel that contains chemical fuel. As you expect, explode when destroyed.
LanguageData.FuelBarrel_Blueprint.label: fuel barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.FuelBarrel_Blueprint_Install.label: fuel barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.FuelBarrel_Frame.label: fuel barrel (building)
LanguageData.FuelBarrel_Frame.description: The big red barrel that contains chemical fuel. As you expect, explode when destroyed.
LanguageData.RSDummy.label: dummy
LanguageData.RSDummy.description: A dummy with a fake rifle. At least, it can draw attention of your enemy.
LanguageData.RSDummy_Blueprint.label: dummy (blueprint)
LanguageData.RSDummy_Blueprint_Install.label: dummy (blueprint)
LanguageData.RSDummy_Frame.label: dummy (building)
LanguageData.RSDummy_Frame.description: A dummy with a fake rifle. At least, it can draw attention of your enemy.
LanguageData.Turret_MC.label: molten cannon
LanguageData.Turret_MC.description: Reliably Propelling a molten metal projectile, Molten cannon is the main anti heavy Mechanoid weapon of Jotunheim Prime. Needs molten shell for firing.
LanguageData.Turret_MC_Blueprint.label: molten cannon (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turret_MC_Frame.label: molten cannon (building)
LanguageData.Turret_MC_Frame.description: Reliably Propelling a molten metal projectile, Molten cannon is the main anti heavy Mechanoid weapon of Jotunheim Prime. Needs molten shell for firing.
LanguageData.Artillery_MC.label: molten cannon
LanguageData.RocketTurret.label: rocket turret
LanguageData.RocketTurret.description: Heavy automatic turret with an anti-mechanoid rocket launcher. Explodes when destroyed.
LanguageData.RocketTurret_Blueprint.label: rocket turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.RocketTurret_Frame.label: rocket turret (building)
LanguageData.RocketTurret_Frame.description: Heavy automatic turret with an anti-mechanoid rocket launcher. Explodes when destroyed.
LanguageData.Bullet_RocketTurret.label: rocket
LanguageData.Gun_RocketTurret.label: rocket launcher
